speech: Welcome to David and Ram's Bike Shop. I can tell you the shop hours, I can set up an appointment, I can describe our bikes, or I can sell you a bike. Which would you like?
Welcome to David and Ram's Bike Shop. I can tell you the shop hours, make an appointment, describe our bikes, or sell you a bike. What can I do for you?
Hello there. I can tell you the shop hours, I can schedule an appointment, I can set up an appointment, I can describe our bikes, or I can sell you a bike. How may I help you today?
